question: Were Scott Derrickson and Ed Wood of the same nationality?
zero_shot_decomposition:
What is a good way to describe someone who has been in many different jobs, but never really found one that he likes?

I'm looking for an adjective or phrase which describes this person. I don't want something like "job-hopper" because it implies they've tried several things without success.

The closest thing I can think of is "jack-of-all-trades", but there's no implication that they're any good at anything (and if you know what I mean by jack-of-all trades then you'll understand why I'd prefer not to use it).

Any suggestions would be appreciated!

-
You could say he/she is a generalist –  user16269 Jan 17 '12 at 16:05
@Mehrdad - That sounds about right! Thanks :) If you post as answer I will accept it. –  ChrisF ♦ Jan 18 '12 at 8:53
